column4: sudo apt-get install gstreamer0.8-mad - has broken packages..
you can build the broken pkgs from source
apt-get will build from source. then you can use dpkg to install the deb it makes
in whatever dir you start in
which pkgs are not gonna be installed?
do you have gcc and other development pkgs installed?
make: Nothing to be done for `INSTALL'.
what exactly are you trying to install?
and how are you going about it?
some programs don't work like that (from source)
read the readme that comes with and maybe the INSTALL
what EXACTLY are you trying to do?
